x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying polygonvertex x-locations

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vectorof values containing a "b" combined with a numeric value specifyingpolygon vertex y-locations.The character vector will place polygon vertex y-locations relativeto the bottom of the most recently plotted plot accordingto the units of the plotgardener page

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x} or \code{y} are only given as numeric vectors.Default value is \code{default.units = "inches"}. Options include: "inches", "cm", "npc", "snpc", "native", "mm", "points"

linecolor.description: A character value specifying polygon line color.Default value is \code{linecolor = "black"}

lwd.description: A numeric specifying polygon line width.Default value is \code{lwd = 1}

lty.description: A numeric specifying polygon line type.Default value is \code{lty = 1}

fill.description: A character value specifying polygon fill color.Default value is \code{fill = NA}

alpha.description: Numeric value specifying color transparency.Default value is \code{alpha = 1}

id.description: A numeric vector used to separate locations in \code{x} and\code{y} into multiple polygons. All locations with the same \code{id}belong to the same polygon

id.lengths.description: A numeric vector used to separate locations in\code{x} and \code{y} into multiple polygons. Specifies consecutiveblocks of locations which make up separate polygons

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
